summary:
An IT practitioner for almost 13 years, with over 11 years of customer-facing roles performed as a QA Engagement Manager, Scrum Master, IT Business Analyst and QA Compliance Analyst in the USA and Canada. 

As a QA engagement manager, I mobilize teams and excel at stakeholder and conflict management. Thorough in IT processes, I am quick to learn new domains and technology and apply them across channels. I instill confidence in customers and team members alike. I facilitate an open and safe work environment. I have excellent interpersonal and communication skills, oral and written. I have managed and led cross-functional QA and business teams across geographies. 

As a Business Analyst, I  have a great eye for detail thus documenting business process flows, requirements and functionality accurately resulting in success 

My "Servant" leadership qualities, communication & collaborating skills along with the attitude to strive to remove impediments for teams have helped me succeed as a Scrum Master

New learning opportunities challenge and excite me. I have impeccable writing skills which I honed with a certificate" Honors"  degree in freelancing (creative writing) from the University of Toronto. Writing assignments excite me. I am currently working on a collection of short stories of inspiration from around the world

I am Level 1 Barista certified by the Specialty Coffee Association. My love for Coffee took me to Florence, Italy to learn more about coffee and the art surrounding it. Part-time opportunities to learn more about coffee and practice my skills make me happy.

I am flexible and adapt quickly to changes. An out-of-box thinker and proponent of innovation and process improvement. I am a positive person who is pleasant to work with. I am mindful and empathetic towards people and my surroundings.

I am self motivated and strive to continue to contribute towards organizational and holistic personal growth

education.degree_name: Barista Basic Certification - Speciality Coffee Association

school.name: Mount Carmel School Dighwadih Dhanbad (Jharkhand India)

education.degree_name: Upto Class X and Class XII - Higher and Secondary School - ICSE Board
education.field_of_study: Science - Maths Physics Chemistry and Computer Science

profile_positions.description: Scrum Master for the Albelli App and Online Editor Teams
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Agile Coach & Sr. Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
For the client's loan origination system (LOS and POS) spanning across Retail, Correspondent and Home Equity, I spearheaded and executed the below roles :
IT Business Analyst: Defining, analyzing and documenting business requirements for key projects. Participating in JAD sessions with DEV and Business to define the business process and IT flows. Creating BRD, FSD, and process flow documents. Actively working to ensure 100% requirement mapping and traceability in HP ALM and JIRA for the concerned projects. Helping improve existing business processes for the customer.
Subject Matter Expertise and QA Auditor: Managing and training cross-functional QA teams including onshore, offshore and client teams. Building an SME team that shadowed the QA teams in both the waterfall and sprint projects as a knowledge repository source, auditing BRDs, User Story Acceptance Criteria, Test Cases, Test Execution Results, and PMO reporting. Helping the client analyze UAT business bottlenecks and provide audit guidance that helped improve quality audit scores 
Utilizing effective stakeholder engagement skills, communication strategies, and project management skills to build a strong quality assurance portfolio for Cognizant at onshore and offshore
profile_positions.title: IT Business Analyst , Quality Subject Matter Expertise &  Auditor for Citibank North America

profile_positions.location: Toronto, Canada Area, Newark Delaware USA, Chicago IL, Irvine CA
profile_positions.description:
For the client's loan origination system (LOS and POS) spanning across Retail and Consumer Direct, I primarily spearheaded and executed the below :
QA Compliance Engagement Manager: Directly responsible for the QA SIT and UAT compliance test deliverables for a 10 member offshore team and 50 + team members onshore team spanning across geographies in US and India. Was the face of the customer to their coveted regulatory compliance and legal partners. Help build and transform new QA processes across teams on the heritage and new loan origination platforms. Key financial projects executed: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reforms, RESPA, HMDA, TILA, Flood Insurance Rules, Regulatory Documents
IT Business Analyst: Helped analyze and drill down business requirements in the form of BRD, FSD, Visio Diagrams And Process flow charts making sure the QA and DEV teams have a clear understanding of the project. Facilitated JAD sessions and defect management calls. Requirement traceability tracking via HP ALM
IT Scrum Master – Acted as a Scrum Master for several QA Projects. Worked closely with the Product Owners and business stakeholders. Helped cleared impediments, protected the team from outside interruptions and distractions and established an environment for the team to be effective. Held Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Poker Planning and Sprint Retrospect calls. Made sure that the principles of Agile are held across teams
profile_positions.title: QA Engagement Manager/IT Business Analyst and Scrum Master for JP Morgan Chase (Mortgage Banking)

profile_positions.location: Pune Area, India and Irvine California
profile_positions.description:
QA Lead (2007 – 2008): Transition Lead for the project relating High Cost and Federal Regulatory Compliance. Led transition activities including Knowledge Transition from existing client vendors in Tampa, FL and Seattle, WA and instrumental in establishing a 6 member offshore team

QA Team Member (2006 – 2007):  Performed responsibilities of a team member in an end to end loan origination platform SIT project. Tracked all STLC activities till closure – Test Planning, Requirement Analysis, Test Execution, Reviews and Reporting to the client
profile_positions.title: Regulatory and High Cost Compliance Lead - Washington Mutual (WaMu Mortgage Banking)

profile_positions.description:
BFS Portal- Banking and Finance portal is an in-house web based application for Cognizant’s banking and finance domain. This application is a house to the storage of millions of critical data pertaining to the banking and finance industry. The system had several hits from users across different cognizant locations in and around the world. Performance testing of the application using Web Load 7.0, Load Runner 8.0 and OpenSTA 
Performance testing was performed from a perspective, to determine how fast some aspect of a system performs under a particular workload. It also served to validate and verify other quality attributes of the system, such as scalability, reliability, and resource usage. 
Performance testing of BFS severed different purposes. It demonstrated that the system meets performance criteria. It compared two systems to find which performs better. It measured what parts of the system or workload cause the system to perform badly. Scope of testing were-
1. Load Testing
2. Stress Testing
3. Endurance Testing
4. Spike Testing
5. Scalability Testing

Role served was that of a team member exploring tools, test environment preparation, execution, and Result Analysis
profile_positions.title: Performance Test Lead
